All Classes

Class
Description
Customer
Customer class consist of attribtues and methods of a customer object
CustomerMgr
This class is used to manage the customer objects.
CustomerUI
This class is the UI for the customer, for capturing user input for staff details and passing it to the customerMgr class
Invoice
An invoice is generated and serves as a receipt for customers.
InvoiceMgr
The control class of invoice entities.
MenuItem
MenuItem class is are the ala carte items in the menu.
MenuItem.TYPE_OF_MENU
An enumeration of the menu item type, which is either a main couse, drink or dessert
MenuItemMgr
This is controllers class to manage the menu items.
MenuItemUI
MenuItemUI class for capturing user inputs and displaying menu options
MenuMgr
Manager for Menu
MenuUI
UI for MenuMgr
Order
An order is created when a customer places an order with the restaurant.
OrderMenuItem
This is an extention of menu item, which includes the quantity ordered, as well as its price multiplied by the quantity
OrderMgr
The control class of the order entities Contains the list of orders For information on each order in the list, please visit order
OrderPromotionPackage
This is an extention of promotion package, which includes the quantity ordered, as well as its price multiplied by the quantity
OrderUI
This is the UI that prints displays for order manager class
PromotionPackage
A promotion package contains two or more menu items, packaged together in a deal.
PromotionPackageMgr
The control class for promotion packages This control class will manage the list of promotion packages
PromotionPackageUI
The UI class used for the promotion package control class Displays pertaining to UI are called from this class
Reservation
A reservation entity is created when a customer makes a reservation with the restaurant.
ReservationMgr
The control class for reservation entities.
ReservationUI
ReservationUI class for capturing user inputs and displaying reservation options
Restaurant
Restaurant class used to start the application Contains main ui to call other classes for a functioning application
Staff
This class is for various attributes and methods of a staff member object.
StaffMgr
This is the controller class for the staff members.
StaffUI
This class represents the UI for capturing user input for staff details and passing it to the StaffMgr class
Table
This is the entity class of table, contains attribtues of table object.
Table.TABLESTATUS
an enumeration of possible table status (reserved, vacant, occupied)
TableMgr
This class is used to manage the table.
TableUI
TableUI class for capturing user inputs and displaying menu options
